SEARCH
Package com.cy_siao.model

Class RestrictionRoom

java.lang.Object
com.cy_siao.model.RestrictionRoom
public class RestrictionRoom extends Object
Represents an association between a Room and a RestrictionType with a logical operator. Links restrictions to rooms and specifies how multiple restrictions should be combined.
